entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 5:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 48 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -19.9°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
